de.lessvoid.nifty.examples.slick2d

Class SlickExampleLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.BasicGame
      • de.lessvoid.nifty.slick2d.NiftyOverlayBasicGame
        • de.lessvoid.nifty.slick2d.NiftyBasicGame
          • de.lessvoid.nifty.examples.slick2d.SlickExampleLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NiftyInputForwarding, NiftyOrderControl, org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.Game, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener

    public class SlickExampleLoader
extends NiftyBasicGame
    This is the general example loader implementation that is able to load the different examples in a unified way. This class will be used for the common examples.
    Author:
    Martin Karing <nitram@illarion.org>
